docs.title: 🏠  Home
docs.text:
💻 PLS-CLI

If you are like me, and your terminal is your home, this CLI will make your life better, I hope 😄

docs.title: ⚙️ Configuration
docs.text:
To run pls-cli everytime you open your shell's:

BashZshFishIonTcshXonshPowershell 
echo 'pls' >> ~/.bashrc

echo 'pls' >> ~/.zshrc

echo 'pls' >> ~/.config/fish/config.fish

echo 'pls' >> ~/.config/ion/initrc

echo 'pls' >> ~/.tcshrc

echo 'pls' >> ~/.xonshrc

Add the following to the end of Microsoft.PowerShell_profile.ps1. You can check the location of this file by querying the $PROFILE variable in PowerShell. Typically the path is ~\Documents\PowerShell\Microsoft.PowerShell_profile.ps1 or ~/.config/powershell/Microsoft.PowerShell_profile.ps1 on -Nix.

pls

Attention

Restart your terminal to apply the changes and start configuring your PLS-CLI. 🎉

docs.title: 🎨  Color Configuration
docs.text:
🎨 Color Configuration

You can configure all colors with envs!!

Linux, macOS, Windows BashWindows PowerShell 
export PLS_ERROR_LINE_STYLE="#e56767"

$Env:PLS_ERROR_LINE_STYLE = "#e56767"

All envs: 

export PLS_ERROR_LINE_STYLE="#e56767"
export PLS_ERROR_TEXT_STYLE="#ff0000 bold"

export PLS_WARNING_LINE_STYLE="#FFBF00"
export PLS_WARNING_TEXT_STYLE="#FFBF00 bold"

export PLS_UPDATE_LINE_STYLE="#61E294"
export PLS_UPDATE_TEXT_STYLE="#61E294 bold"

export PLS_INSERT_DELETE_LINE_STYLE="#bb93f2"

export PLS_INSERT_DELETE_TEXT_STYLE="#a0a0a0"

export PLS_MSG_PENDING_STYLE="#61E294"
export PLS_TABLE_HEADER_STYLE="#d77dd8"
export PLS_TASK_DONE_STYLE="#a0a0a0"
export PLS_TASK_PENDING_STYLE="#bb93f2"
export PLS_HEADER_GREETINGS_STYLE="#FFBF00"
export PLS_QUOTE_STYLE="#a0a0a0"
export PLS_AUTHOR_STYLE="#a0a0a0"

export PLS_BACKGROUND_BAR_STYLE="bar.back"
export PLS_COMPLETE_BAR_STYLE="bar.complete"
export PLS_FINISHED_BAR_STYLE="bar.finished"

You can specify the background color like this: 
export PLS_QUOTE_STYLE="#a0a0a0 on blue"

If you create some theme, share with us here .

docs.title: 💄 Formatting a task
docs.text:
You can format your tasks with: 
pls add "[b]Bold[/], [i]Italic[/], [s]Strikethrough[/], [d]Dim[/], [r]Reverse[/], [red]Color Red[/], [#FFBF00 on green]Color exa with background[/], :star:, ✨"

To learn more check out the Rich docs.

 ・Minimalist and full configurable greetings and TODO list・

╭─ Options ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --install-completion          Install completion for the current shell.      │

docs.title: 🆘   Help PLS-CLI - Get Help
docs.text:
🆘 Help PLS-CLI - Get Help

Do you like PLS-CLI?

Would you like to help PLS-CLI, other users, and the author?

Or would you like to get help with PLS-CLI?

There are very simple ways to help (several involve just one or two clicks).

And there are several ways to get help too.

docs.title: ⭐️ PLS-CLI in GitHub
docs.text: You can "star" in GitHub (clicking in the star button at the top right): https://github.com/guedesfelipe/pls-cli.

docs.title: 👀 Watch the GitHub repository for releases
docs.text:
You can "watch" PLS-CLI in GitHub (clicking the "watch" button at the top right):

https://github.com/guedesfelipe/pls-cli.

There you can select "Custom -> Releases".

By doing it, you will receive notifications (in your email) whenever there's a new release (a new version) of PLS-CLI with bug fixes and new features.

docs.title: 🔭 Watch the GitHub repository
docs.text:
You can "watch" PLS-CLI in GitHub (clicking the "watch" button at the top right):

https://github.com/guedesfelipe/pls-cli.

If you select "Watching" instead of "Releases only" you will receive notifications when someone creates a new issue.

Then you can try to help them solve those issues.

docs.title: 🆘 Help others with issues in GitHub
docs.text: You can see existing issues and try to help others, most of the times they are questions that you might already know the answer for. 🤓

docs.title: 📝Create issues
docs.text:
You can create a new issue in the GitHub repository, for example to:

  • Ask a question or ask about a problem.
  • Suggest a new feature.
